site_name: Former Gasworks Swandon Way, Calor Gas Unit 9 and 10 Delta Business Park Smugglers Way and Land West of the River Wandle The Causeway, LONDON, SW18
description: This Council has been asked for its observations on an application submitted to Wandsworth Council (2022/3954) for: Amended submission for a Hybrid planning application (part Outline, part Detailed)for the demolition of all existing buildings and structures on site and a phased development comprising the construction of buildings across four development plots to include up to 620 dwellings with affordable housing (Use Class C3 (Residential) and Use Class C2 (Residential Institutions)); up to 4,555sqm of non-residential floorspace; with associated works.Detailed planning permission for the construction of Building A1 (part 10, part 29 storeys high, plus roof level plant equipment) to accommodate 178 dwellings (Class C3) and 789sqm of retail, food and drink floorspace (Class E); Construction of Building B (Including 3 storey podium and 3 buildings with heights ranging from 13, 14 and 15 storeys plus basement and roof level plant equipment) to accommodate 204 senior living dwellings (Use Classes C2/ C3) with 1,884sqm of ancillary communal floorspace, 2,917sqm of restaurant, cinema, workspace and retail floorspace (Classes E, B8 and Sui Generis); change of use of the existing railway arches to accommodate 501sqm of retail, food and drink, workspace and live music venue floorspace (Classes E and Sui Generis) including associated elevational changes; provision of vehicular access, cycle and car parking; energy centre; public realm works and landscaping; works to the River Wandle including riverside walk; associated infrastructure; and site preparation works.Outline planning permission for two development plots; Building A2 of up to 12 storeys, including up to 88 dwellings (Class C3) and 400sqm of non-residential floorspaces (Classes E and F2); Building A3 of up to 12 storeys, including up to 150 dwellings (Class C3) and 200sqm of commercial floorspace (Class E). Access, Appearance, Landscaping, Layout, and Scale are Reserved Matters.An Environmental Statement has been submitted with the application under The Town and CountryPlanning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017.[Amendments include: description of the proposal, location plan, heights, number of homes andfloorspaces of non-residential elements.]
